channel.title: Help i tried making npcs talk and got 4 errors (pictures included 2)
channel.description:
soo i added my npc and compiled i had no errors and then the n pc was in the spot i place him in autospawn.cfg but now when i went to make him talk i went to npchandler and posted this code: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/x51uac.jpg[/img]
Then when i went to compile i got these 4** errors@! [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/n4bcrb.jpg[/img]
Sommeone help me please

item.title: Help i tried making npcs talk and got 4 errors (pictures included 2)
item.dc:creator: @ipkudown ipkudown
item.description:
@ipkudown wrote:

Delete The “}” Above that code you added

and add it again under the code you added

it will be like this

                 }
    }

}

Read full topic
